Nginx Port 80 changes and run sails.js via port 80

port changes

Posted by Lucas Gatsas

Nginx Port 80

To change the Port from Ngnix to :81 in very easy steps. : Open your path in your Terminal root. go to this path /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/

The Code inside and port changes to :81
